title: Hour 2: Not Safe for Kirk?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, and Marcus Spears get into how important this Week 3 matchup between the Packers and the Bucs is for Aaron Rodgers. Plus, the Vikings took the L against Philly this week, but is Kirk Cousins the problem in Minnesota? Tim Kurkjian joins the show to help us settle the debate of which homerun storyline deserves more hype: Albert Pujols' chase to 700 or Aaron Judge with 60 this season? Mad Dog is mad 7 days a week, but on Wednesdays he tells us why. Find out who his rage is directed at this week.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Will Kirk Cousins hold the Vikings back this season?
